level.text: Any outdoor sign or other form of exterior advertising erected in any district shall comply with the sign regulations in the D.C. Construction Code, 12 DCMR art. 14, that govern the erection, hanging, placing, painting, display, and maintenance of outdoor display signs and other forms of exterior advertising within the District of Columbia.
